Html:
Hi Guys,

I was trying to install the 2.05 beta to see if it fixes the @keyframes issues with the new dotlesscss version. But I keep getting the folowing error (about a 100 of them :) ). Any idea how I can get it to work? I realize it is a beta, but having @keyframes support would really help my team in our current project and save us a lot of time.

Chrip - failed to load: CssType=Object reference not set to an instance of an object.

Thanks in advance!
Kind regards,
  Robertjan Tuit

Hi,

And a couple of minutes later I read this: :)
﻿﻿﻿﻿﻿﻿http://chirpy.codeplex.com/SourceControl/changeset/changes/8460d7b71ebf

Thanks for the quick fix! ;)

Any idea when you will be ready to release an updated version?

Thanks!
   Robertjan Tuit

Thank you!

Sent from my Windows Phone
From: ploufs
Sent: 6/1/2012 17:28
To: Robertjan Tuit
Subject: Re: 2.05: Chrip - failed to load: CssType=Object reference not set to an instance of an object. [chirpy:357317]

Chirpy v 3.06 release may 29.
